Ini Kandidat Kuat Direktur Utama Bank Mandiri yang Baru
01 Nov 2019, 11:47 by Caesar Akbar, Kodrat Setiawan
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Menteri Badan Usaha Milik Negara Erick Thohir mengatakan sudah mengantongi nama Dirut Bank Mandiri yang baru. Posisi tersebut kosong setelah Presiden Joko Widodo atau Jokowi menunjuk Kartika Wirjoatmodjo sebagai Wakil Menteri BUMN.
Namun, Erick menolak menyebut nama Dirut Bank Mandiri tersebut. Dia memastikan bawah posisi Dirut Bank Mandiri akan diisi oleh internal yang selama ini berada di perusahaan. Jika bukan internal, kata dia, pihak tersebut pernah bekerja di Bank Mandiri atau lulusan Bank Mandiri. "Yang pasti bekas lulusan atau masih orang Bank Mandiri," kata dia, Rabu lalu, 30 Oktober 2019.
Pernyataan Erick senada dengan komentar Kartika saat dilantik menjadi Wakil Menteri BUMN. Kartika berharap penggantinya berasal dari kalangan internal bank plat merah tersebut. "Tentunya kita harapkan teman-teman dari dalam menjadi pilihan yang lebih diutamakan,‚Äù katanya, seusai dilantik Presiden Joko Widodo di Istana Negara, Jumat 25 Oktober 2019.
Menurut sejumlah sumber Tempo di Kementerian BUMN, kandidat kuat direktur utama Bank Mandiri adalah Royke Tumilaar. Dia saat ini masih menjabat sebagai Direktur Corporate Banking.
Saat pergantian dirut Bank Mandiri 2016 lalu, nama Royke juga muncul sebagai kandidat bersama Kartiko Wirjoatmodjo yang saat itu menjabat sebagai Direktur Finance and Strategy; dan Pahala N Mansury yang saat itu menjadi Direktur Treasury and Market. Namun untuk menggantikan Budi Gunadi Sadikin yang mengakhiri masa tugas, akhirnya terpilih Kartika sebagai Dirut Bank Mandiri.
Tempo berusaha menghubungi Wakil Komisaris Utama Bank Mandiri sekaligus Sekretaris Kementerian BUMN Imam Apriyanto Putra, Deputi Bidang Jasa Keuangan, Jasa Survei, dan Konsultan BUMN Gatot Trihargo, serta Royke terkait pemilihan nama dirut Bank Mandiri. Namun, ketiganya belum merespons pesan yang dilayangkan Tempo.

CAESAR AKBAR
text:
This is a Strong Candidate for the New President Director of Bank Mandiri
01 Nov 2019, 11:47 by Caesar Akbar, Kodrat Setiawan
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Minister of State-Owned Enterprises Erick Thohir said that he had already gotten the name of the new Bank Mandiri Managing Director. The position was vacant after President Joko Widodo or Jokowi appointed Kartika Wirjoatmodjo as Deputy Minister of BUMN.
However, Erick refused to mention the name of the Managing Director of Bank Mandiri. He made sure that Bank Mandiri's Managing Director position would be filled by internal staff who had been at the company. If not internal, he said, the party had worked at Bank Mandiri or Bank Mandiri graduates. "What is certain is that they are former graduates or are still Bank Mandiri people," he said, last Wednesday, 30 October 2019.
Erick's statement was in line with Kartika's comments when appointed as Deputy Minister of BUMN. Kartika hopes that the successor will come from the internal circles of the red plate bank. "Surely we hope that friends from within will become the preferred choice," he said, after being sworn in by President Joko Widodo at the State Palace, Friday, October 25, 2019.
According to a number of Tempo sources at the SOE Ministry, the strong candidate for Bank Mandiri's chief director was Royke Tumilaar. He currently serves as Director of Corporate Banking.
At the turn of the 2016 Bank Mandiri president director, Royke's name also appeared as a candidate along with Kartiko Wirjoatmodjo who was then serving as Director of Finance and Strategy; and Pahala N Mansury, who was then Director of Treasury and Market. But to replace Budi Gunadi Sadikin who ended his term of service, Kartika was finally chosen as Managing Director of Bank Mandiri.
Tempo tried to contact the Deputy Commissioner of Bank Mandiri as well as the Secretary of the Ministry of SOEs Imam Apriyanto Putra, Deputy of Financial Services, Survey Services, and BUMN Consultant Gatot Trihargo, and Royke regarding the selection of the name of Bank Mandiri president director. However, the three of them have not responded to the message posted by Tempo.

CAESAR AKBAR
